InertialModels
InertialModels

Contains the models of Inertial hardware.

Types
NodeModel

The model numbers for each of the Inertial Nodes.

Functions
nodeFromModelString
static NodeModel nodeFromModelString(
const std::string &modelNumberString
)

Converts the model number string received from an InertialNode to a NodeModel enum.

Parameters
modelNumberString
const std::string&

The model number string recieved in an InertialNode's Get Device Info packet.

Returns

A NodeModel enum created from the string.
